name: Xcel Heathered VentX Pineapple Long Sleeve Top - Women's
categories: Heathered VentX Pineapple Long Sleeve Top
description: In a sea of solid rashguards, stand out and add a little pineapple-power to your stroke. Made for performance paddlers, dragon boaters and athletes working it hard. It’s lightweight, quick-drying and breathable, and the relaxed t-shirt fit makes it comfortable to wear on the shore.Made of moisture-wicking polyester and spandex with 4-way stretch.Fabric provides UPF 20 sun protection.Thumbholes help keep the sleeves from riding up when wrestling with the surf.Raglan sleeves keep the shoulders from bunching up when paddling.
